titleStmt.title: A Quakers sermon: preached at the Bull-and-Mouth Metting-House in St. Martins-Le-Grand, London. On Sunday the 16th. of Nov. 1674. Taken from his mouth in short-hand by an indifferent person.

notesStmt.note: Smith -- A foolish libel upon Friends.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
